ThingDef.label: Alphabeaver Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the smooth, leathery skin of an Alphabeaver.

ThingDef.label: Alphamuffalo Wool
ThingDef.description: This is wool taken from an Alphamuffalo, be it sheared or skinned.

ThingDef.label: Border Collie Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a Border Collie.

ThingDef.label: Capybara Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the smoothed, hairy skin of a Capybara.

ThingDef.label: Chinchilla Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the soft, gorgeous fur of a Chinchilla.

ThingDef.label: Cobra Hide
ThingDef.description: Cobra Hide is the skin of a Cobra. It is smooth and hairless.

ThingDef.label: Cow Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the short-haired, leathery skin of a Cow.

ThingDef.label: Deer Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the smoothed, leathery skin of a Deer.

ThingDef.label: Elephant Hide
ThingDef.description: This is the rough, skinned hide of an Elephant.

ThingDef.label: Elk Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the smooth, leathery skin of an Elk.

ThingDef.label: Feathered Raptor Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the feathered skin of a Feathered Raptor. This rare, exotic leather is quite valuable.

ThingDef.label: Feenix Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the hot leathery skin of a Feenix. Feenixes are creatures seemingly born from the essence of heat, and are resistant to the effects of heat. Wearing its leather can help you resist heat too.

ThingDef.label: Fenrir Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the elegant, furry skin of a Fenrir. This rare, exotic fur once belonged to a fearsome beast that cold survive extremely cold weather.

ThingDef.label: Furx Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a Furx. While Furx Fur is luxurious and sleek, most hunters deem it a waste of time to hunt for Furxes due to their small body size.

ThingDef.label: German Shepherd Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a German Shepherd.

ThingDef.label: Hare Fur
ThingDef.description: This is a furry skin of a Hare.

ThingDef.label: Hedgehog Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the smoothed skin of a Hedgehog, with the sharp quills removed.

ThingDef.label: Human Skin
ThingDef.description: This is the skin of a Human, a humanlike race. It is unsettling to think that someone took the time to butcher a dead Human while keeping its skin intact as a textile.

ThingDef.label: Husky Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a Husky.

ThingDef.label: Icicat Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the frigid leathery skin of an Icicat. Icicats are creatures seemingly born from the essence of cold, and are resistant to the effects of cold temperatures. Wearing its leather can help you resist cold temperatures too.

ThingDef.label: Iguana Hide
ThingDef.description: This is the rough, scaly hide of an Iguana.

ThingDef.label: Labrador Retriever Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a Labrador Retriever.

ThingDef.label: Lacosdile Hide
ThingDef.description: This is the rough hide of a Lacosdile.

ThingDef.label: Lion Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a Lion or Lioness.

ThingDef.label: Monkey Leather
ThingDef.description: Monkey Leather is the skin of a Monkey. It has short hairs that feel smooth to the touch.

ThingDef.label: Narn Skin
ThingDef.description: This is the skin of a Narn, a humanlike race. It is unsettling to think that someone took the time to butcher a dead Narn while keeping its skin intact as a textile.

ThingDef.label: Norbal Skin
ThingDef.description: This is the skin of a Norbal, a humanlike race. It is unsettling to think that someone took the time to butcher a dead Norbal while keeping its skin intact as a textile.

ThingDef.label: Nova Skin
ThingDef.description: This is the skin of a Nova, a humanlike race. It is unsettling to think that someone took the time to butcher a dead Nova while keeping its skin intact as a textile.

ThingDef.label: Pig Hide
ThingDef.description: This is the short-haired, rough hide of a Pig.

ThingDef.label: Quadhog Wool
ThingDef.description: This is wool taken from a Quadhog, be it sheared or skinned.

ThingDef.label: Rhinoceros Hide
ThingDef.description: this is the tough, rough hide of a Rhinoceros.

ThingDef.label: Rimdog Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a Rimdog.

ThingDef.label: Rimwolf Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a Rimwolf.

ThingDef.label: Samoyed Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a Samoyed.

ThingDef.label: Snork Hide
ThingDef.description: This is the rugged, hairless hide of a Snork.

ThingDef.label: Squirrel Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the smooth skin of a Squirrel.

ThingDef.label: Thrumbo Wool
ThingDef.description: This is the majestic wool of a Thrumbo that was sheared or skinned from the corpse of one.

ThingDef.label: Tortoise Hide
ThingDef.description: This is the rough, leathery skin of a Tortoise.

ThingDef.label: Yorkshire Terrier Fur
ThingDef.description: This is the furry skin of a Yorkshire Terrier.

ThingDef.label: Warg Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the smooth, leathery skin of a Warg.

ThingDef.label: Wild Boar Leather
ThingDef.description: This is the hairy, leathery skin of a Wild Boar.

ThingDef.label: Boiled Leather
ThingDef.description: Boiled Leather is skins from creatures that have had the hairs and furs removed, and then boiled in liquid to harden the skin. It is useful for hardened grips on weapons or for reinforcing armor.
